script:module:
dim DestnSheet as object dim DestnForm as object
const _DestnGameCol = 0 const _DestnDeckCol = _DestnGameCol + 1 const _DestnJumpCol = _DestnGameCol + 2 const _DestnDistanceCol = _DestnGameCol + 3 const _DestnFuelCol = _DestnGameCol + 4 const _DestnOtherCol = _DestnGameCol + 5 const _DestnActionCol = _DestnGameCol + 6
const _DestnRow = 7
const _DestnBaseCnt = 22 const _DestnPegasusCnt = 5 const _DestnExodusCnt = 7 const _DestnDaybreakCnt = 0 const _DestnRevelationsCnt = 5 const _MaxDestnCnt = _DestnBaseCnt + _DestnPegasusCnt + _DestnExodusCnt + _DestnDaybreakCnt + _DestnRevelationsCnt
const _DestnTotalCol = 3 const _DestnTotalRow = 5
const _DestnBuryCntCol = 4 const _DestnBuryCntRow = 5
const _DistanceTriggerSleeper = 1 const _DistanceTriggerEndgame = 2 const _DistanceTriggerCivilWar = 3 const _DistanceTriggerRow = 2 const _DistanceTriggerCol = 0
const _SleeperDistance = 4 const _KobolDistance = 8 const _NewCapricaDistance = 7 const _IonianNebulaDistance = 8 const _EarthDistance = 10 const _CivilWarDistance = 1 const _ColonyDistance = 7
const _SpecialBaseCnt = 1 const _SpecialDaybreakCnt = 0 const _SpecialRevelationsCnt = 2 const _MaxSpecialCnt = _SpecialBaseCnt + _SpecialDaybreakCnt + _SpecialRevelationsCnt
sub GetDestn if DestnSheet <> NULL then exit sub end if
DestnSheet= ThisComponent.Sheets.getByName("Destination Cards") DestnForm = DestnSheet.DrawPage.Forms.GetByName("formDestination") Randomize end sub
function GetDestnBuryCnt as integer GetDestnBuryCnt = DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnBuryCntCol,_DestnBuryCntRow).value end function
sub SetDestnBuryCnt (reset as boolean) if reset then DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnBuryCntCol,_DestnBuryCntRow).value = 0 else DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnBuryCntCol,_DestnBuryCntRow).value = DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnBuryCntCol,_DestnBuryCntRow).value + 1 end if end sub
function GetTotalDistance as integer GetDestn GetTotalDistance = DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnTotalCol, _DestnTotalRow).value end function
sub SetTotalDistance (newdist as integer) DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnTotalCol, _DestnTotalRow).value = newdist end sub
function GetDestnCnt as integer dim curcnt as integer
curcnt = _DestnBaseCnt if GameTypeIsPegasus() then curcnt = curcnt + _DestnPegasusCnt end if
if GameTypeIsExodus() then curcnt = curcnt + _DestnExodusCnt if UseCylonFleet() then curcnt = curcnt -1 'Mining Asteroid is removed when using the fleet end if end if
if GameTypeIsDaybreak then curcnt = curcnt + _DestnDaybreakCnt end if
if GameTypeIsRevelations() then curcnt = curcnt + _DestnRevelationsCnt end if GetDestnCnt = curcnt end function 'GetDestnCnt
sub Initialize_Destination
'move all the jumped destinations back into the deck, then reshuffle. dim destid, specials as integer GetDestn
SetDestnBuryCnt TRUE 'reset the count so that nothing has been buried
' move all the jumped cards back into the deck for destid = 1 to _MaxDestnCnt + _MaxSpecialCnt if DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnDeckCol,_DestnRow + destid).String = "" then DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnDeckCol,_DestnRow + destid).String = DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnJumpCol,_DestnRow + destid).String DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnJumpCol,_DestnRow + destid).String = "" end if next destID
ShuffleDestination TRUE 'this reorders things by gametype specials = _SpecialBaseCnt if GameTypeIsDaybreak then specials = specials + _SpecialDaybreakCnt end if if GameTypeIsRevelations then specials = specials + _SpecialRevelationsCnt end if
' now hide the rows we don't want for destID = 1 to _MaxDestnCnt + _MaxSpecialCnt if destID <= GetDestnCnt()+ specials then DestnSheet.Rows(_DestnRow + destID).IsVisible = TRUE else DestnSheet.Rows(_DestnRow + destID).IsVisible = FALSE end if next destID ShuffleDestination FALSE
SetTotalDistance 0 DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DistanceTriggerCol + _DistanceTriggerSleeper, _DistanceTriggerRow).String = "" DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DistanceTriggerCol + _DistanceTriggerEndgame, _DistanceTriggerRow).String = "" DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DistanceTriggerCol + _DistanceTriggerCivilWar, _DistanceTriggerRow).String = "" UpdateTTTargetList EnableDestButtons TRUE DestnForm.getByName("btnLegendary").enabled = FALSE end sub 'Initialize_Destination
function GetDestnGameType (destid as integer) as string GetDestnGameType = DestnSheet.getCellByPosition(_DestnGameCol, _DestnRow + destID).string end function
' this will reshuffle the destination deck. ' Note: this is called directly by the "reshuffle" button sub ReshuffleDestination ShuffleDestination FALSE end sub
' it assumes the deck is already correct, so it will not shuffle in any cards that have been played or ' any that have been buried. ' if asConfigure is set, we want to sort the cards by game type, not randomly
sub ShuffleDestination (asConfigure as boolean) dim sortOrder(_MaxDestnCnt + _MaxSpecialCnt), tmpval as double dim destdata(_MaxDestnCnt + _MaxSpecialCnt, 6), tmpdata(6) as string dim destid, i,j, k, destncnt, topofdeck as integer dim tmp as string GetDestn
if asConfigure then topofdeck = _DestnRow destncnt = _MaxDestnCnt + _MaxSpecialCnt else destnCnt = GetDestnCnt() - GetDestnBuryCnt() topofdeck = _DestnRow + 1 do until DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnDeckCol,topofdeck).String <> "" topofdeck = topofdeck + 1 destnCnt = destnCnt - 1 loop topofdeck = topofdeck - 1 end if
for destid = 1 to destnCnt for i = 0 to 6 destdata(destid, i) = DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnGameCol + i, topofdeck + destid).String next i if asConfigure then tmp = GetDestnGameType(destid) if (tmp = "B" OR (tmp = "P" and GameTypeIsPegasus()) OR (tmp = "E" and GameTypeIsExodus()) OR (tmp = "D" and GameTypeIsDaybreak) OR (tmp = "R" and GameTypeIsRevelations())) AND _ NOT (destdata(destID, 1) = "Mining Asteroid" and UseCylonFleet()) then sortOrder(destid) = 0 elseif tmp = "BX" or (tmp = "DX" and GameTypeIsDaybreak) or (tmp = "RX" and GameTypeIsRevelations()) then 'placeholders sortOrder(destid) = 0.5 else sortOrder(destid) = 1 end if else sortOrder(destid) = rnd() end if next destID
' now we sort for i = 1 to destnCnt - 1 for j = i + 1 to destnCnt if sortOrder(i) > sortOrder(j) then tmpval = sortOrder(i) for k = 0 to 6 tmpdata(k) = destdata(i,k) next k
sortOrder(i) = sortOrder(j) for k = 0 to 6 destData(i,k) = destData(j,k) next k
sortOrder(j) = tmpval for k = 0 to 6 destData(j,k) = tmpdata(k) next k end if next j next i
for destid = 1 to destnCnt for i = 0 to 6 DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnGameCol + i, topofdeck + destid).String = destData(destid, i) next i next destID
end sub 'ShuffleDestination
sub JumpToDestination dim destid, rtncd, destndist, prevdist, shipid, howmany, i as integer dim destnstr, msgstr, tmpstr as string GetDestn GetGS
if MsgBox("Did you handle any Population/Civilian Loss?", 4, "FTL Control") <> 6 then exit sub end if
'get the first available destination for destid = 1 to GetDestnCnt() if DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnDeckCol,_DestnRow + destID).String <> "" then destnstr = DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnDeckCol,_DestnRow + destID).String destndist = DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnDistanceCol,_DestnRow + destID).String exit for end if next destID rtncd = MsgBox ("Select " & destnstr & " (Distance " & destndist & ") as the next jump destination?",4,"Confirm Destination") if rtncd <> 6 then exit sub end if DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnJumpCol,_DestnRow + destID).String = DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnDeckCol,_DestnRow + destID).String DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnDeckCol,_DestnRow + destID).String = ""
prevdist = GetTotalDistance() SetTotalDistance prevdist + destndist
ActivateJump FALSE
' lose resources for i = 1 to (val(DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnFuelCol,_DestnRow + destID).String)*-1) ReduceResource 0 next i
msgstr = "" MsgBox "Fuel reduced by " & (val(DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnFuelCol,_DestnRow + destID).String)*-1) LogThis "Fuel reduced by " & (val(DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnFuelCol,_DestnRow + destID).String)*-1) select case left(DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnOtherCol,_DestnRow + destID).String,4) case "Food" ' only one dest for food, which increases it by one IncreaseResource _ResourceFood msgstr = "Food increased by 1"
case "Mora" ' morale destinations are +/- 1 if val(right(DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnOtherCol,_DestnRow + destID).String,2)) > 0 then IncreaseResource _ResourceMorale msgstr = "Morale increased by 1" else ReduceResource _ResourceMorale msgstr= "Morale reduced by 1" end if
case "Popu" ' population desinations are +/- 1 if val(right(DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnOtherCol,_DestnRow + destID).String,2)) > 0 then IncreaseResource _ResourcePopulation msgstr="Population increased by 1" else ReduceResource _ResourcePopulation msgstr="Population decreased by 1" end if
case "Civi" 'draw a civilian ship and destroy it DestroyACivilian
case "Vipe" 'repair two damaged vipers shipid=GetAvailableShip(_ShipViper, _ShipStatusDamaged) if shipid = 0 then MsgBox "No Vipers to repair" else SetShipStatus _ShipViper, shipID, _ShipStatusOffBoard shipid=GetAvailableShip(_ShipViper, _ShipStatusDamaged) if shipid = 0 then msgstr = "1 Vipers Repaired" else SetShipStatus _ShipViper, shipID, _ShipStatusOffBoard msgstr = "2 Vipers Repaired" end if end if
case "Rapt" shipid=GetAvailableShip(_ShipRaptor) if shipid=0 then MsgBox "No Raptors to destroy" else SetShipStatus _ShipRaptor, shipID, _ShipStatusDestroyed msgstr = "Raptor destroyed." end if
case "Depl" 'there are 4 deploys possible other than scar, don't bother generalizing at this point select case DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnJumpCol,_DestnRow + destID).String case "Binary Star" 'deploy two civs...first make sure there are two available. if GetAvailableShipCnt(_ShipCivilian) = 0 then MsgBox "No Civilians available to deploy." elseif GetAvailableShipCnt(_ShipCivilian) = 1 then MsgBox "Only 1 Civilian available to deploy, ask current player where to put it (1 or 4)." else shipid=GetAvailableShip(_ShipCivilian) SetShipStatus _ShipCivilian, ShipID, 1 shipid=GetAvailableShip(_ShipCivilian) SetShipStatus _ShipCivilian, ShipID, 4 msgstr = "Civilian Ships deployed in Sectors 1 & 4." end if
case "Cylon Ambush" 'deploy a basestar, 3 raiders, 3 civilians shipid=GetAvailableShip(_ShipBasestar) if shipid = 0 then MsgBox "No Basestar available to deploy" else SetShipStatus _ShipBasestar, shipID, 1 msgstr = "Basestar deployed in Sector 1. " end if howmany = GetAvailableShipCnt(_ShipRaider) if howmany = 0 then MsgBox "No Raiders available to deploy" else if howmany < 3 then MsgBox "Only " & howmany & " Raiders available to deploy." elseif howmany > 3 then howmany = 3 end if for i = 1 to howmany shipid = GetAvailableShip(_ShipRaider) SetShipStatus _ShipRaider, shipID, 1 next i msgstr = msgstr & howmany & " Raiders deployed in Sector 1." end if howmany = GetAvailableShipCnt(_ShipCivilian) if howmany = 0 then MsgBox "No Civilians available to deploy" else if howmany < 3 then MsgBox "Only " & howmany & " Civilians available to deploy." elseif howmany > 3 then howmany = 3 end if for i = 1 to howmany shipid = GetAvailableShip(_ShipCivilian) SetShipStatus _ShipCivilian, shipID, 4 next i msgstr = msgstr & howmany & " Civilians deployed in Sector 4." end if
case "Derelict Basestar" shipid=GetAvailableShip(_ShipBasestar) if shipid = 0 then MsgBox "No Basestar available to deploy" else SetShipStatus _ShipBasestar, shipID, 1 msgstr = "Basestar deployed in Sector 1. " end if howmany = GetAvailableShipCnt(_ShipCivilian) if howmany = 0 then MsgBox "No Civilians available to deploy" else if howmany < 2 then MsgBox "Only " & howmany & " Civilians available to deploy." elseif howmany > 2 then howmany = 2 end if for i = 1 to howmany shipid = GetAvailableShip(_ShipCivilian) SetShipStatus _ShipCivilian, shipID, 4 next i msgstr = msgstr & howmany & " Civilians deployed in Sector 4." end if
case "Cylon Raiders" howmany = GetAvailableShipCnt(_ShipRaider) if howmany = 0 then MsgBox "No Raiders available to deploy" else if howmany < 3 then MsgBox "Only " & howmany & " Raiders available to deploy." elseif howmany > 3 then howmany = 3 end if for i = 1 to howmany shipid = GetAvailableShip(_ShipRaider) SetShipStatus _ShipRaider, shipID, 4 next i msgstr = msgstr & howmany & " Raiders deployed in Sector 4." end if
end select end select
if msgstr <> "" then MsgBox msgstr LogThis msgstr end if
if DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnActionCol,_DestnRow + destID).String <> "" then MsgBox "Special Jump Action: " & DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnActionCol,_DestnRow + destID).String end if
LogThis "The Fleet jumps to " & destnstr & " (Distance " & destndist & ")" & " - Total distance now " & prevdist + destndist
HandleDistanceTriggers DiscardCurrentMission
if MsgBox ("Do you need to bury any Destinations?",4,"Bury Destination") = 6 then BuryDestination if MsgBox ("Do you need to bury a second Destination (Mission Specialist)?",4,"Bury Destination") = 6 then BuryDestination end if end if
end sub
sub SetDistanceTrigger (trigger as integer) DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DistanceTriggerCol + trigger, _DistanceTriggerRow).String = "X" end sub
function CheckDistanceTrigger (trigger as integer) as boolean CheckDistanceTrigger = DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DistanceTriggerCol + trigger, _DistanceTriggerRow).String <> "" end function
sub HandleDistanceTriggers (optional legendary as boolean)
if IsMissing(legendary) then legendary = FALSE end if
' if my destination total is > 4 and it wasn't before, deal sleeper cards if ((GetTotalDistance() >= _SleeperDistance) and (not CheckDistanceTrigger(_DistanceTriggerSleeper))) then MsgBox "Entering Sleeper Agent Phase." DealSleeperCards SetDistanceTrigger(_DistanceTriggerSleeper) LogThis "Entering Sleeper Agent Phase" end if
if UseCivilWar() then if GetTotalDistance >= _CivilWarDistance and not CheckDistanceTrigger(_DistanceTriggerCivilWar) then ' Cylon Civil War end if end if
if ObjectiveIsKobol() then if GetTotalDistance() >= _KobolDistance and not CheckDistanceTrigger(_DistanceTriggerEndgame) then MsgBox "One more jump to Kobol!" EnableDestButtons FALSE ' no more destination card activity SetDistanceTrigger(_DistanceTriggerEndgame) end if elseif ObjectiveIsNewCaprica() then if GetTotalDistance() >= _NewCapricaDistance and not CheckDistanceTrigger(_DistanceTriggerEndgame) then MsgBox "Entering New Caprica Phase" EnableDestButtons FALSE ' no more destination card activity if UseCylonFleet or legendary then ' Have to handle this because they won't get swept by the Jump when using the CFB. SweepShips (_ShipCivilian, FALSE) ShuffleCivilians end if LandPlayers LandShips LogThis "Entering New Caprica Phase" SetGamePhase _PhaseOnNewCaprica SetDistanceTrigger(_DistanceTriggerEndgame) end if elseif ObjectiveIsIonianNebula() then if GetTotalDistance() >=_IonianNebulaDistance and not CheckDistanceTrigger(_DistanceTriggerEndgame) then MsgBox "We have reached the CROSSROADS!" EnableDestButtons FALSE DealCrossroads BattleOfIonianNebula SetDistanceTrigger(_DistanceTriggerEndgame) end if elseif ObjectiveIsEarth then if GetTotalDistance() >= _EarthDistance and not CheckDistanceTrigger(_DistanceTriggerEndgame) then MsgBox "One more jump to Earth!" EnableDestButtons FALSE ' no more destination card activity SetDistanceTrigger(_DistanceTriggerEndgame) end if elseif ObjectiveIsColony() then if GetTotalDistance() >= _ColonyDistance and not CheckDistanceTrigger(_DistanceTriggerEndgame) then ' Colony end if end if end sub
sub BuryDestination dim destID, startrow, rtncd, destndist as integer dim i as integer dim destnstr, destndesc, destngame, tmpdestn(6) as string GetDestn
'get the first available destination for destID = 1 to GetDestnCnt() if DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnDeckCol,_DestnRow + destID).String <> "" then for i = 0 to 6 tmpdestn(i) = DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnGameCol+i,_DestnRow + destID).String next i destnstr = DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnDeckCol,_DestnRow + destID).String startrow = destID exit for end if next destID rtncd = MsgBox ("Move " & destnstr & " to the bottom of the deck?",4) if rtncd <> 6 then exit sub end if
for destID = startrow + 1 to GetDestnCnt() + Legendary() for i = 0 to 6 DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnGameCol+i, _DestnRow + destID - 1).String = DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnGameCol+i, _DestnRow + destID).String next i next destID for i = 0 to 6 DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnGameCol+i, _DestnRow + GetDestnCnt() + Legendary()).String = tmpdestn(i) next i
SetDestnBuryCnt FALSE LogThis destnstr & " moved to the bottom of the destination deck." LogBuryCard _CardTypeDest, destnstr end sub
sub SwapDestination dim destID, startrow, rtncd, destndist as integer dim i as integer dim destnstr, destndesc, destngame, tmpdestn(6) as string GetDestn
'get the first available destination for destID = 1 to GetDestnCnt() if DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnDeckCol,_DestnRow + destID).String <> "" then for i = 0 to 6 tmpdestn(i) = DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnGameCol+i,_DestnRow + destID).String next i destnstr = DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnDeckCol,_DestnRow + destID).String startrow = destID exit for end if next destID
rtncd = MsgBox ("Swap position for destinations " & destnstr & " and " & DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnDeckCol, _DestnRow + startrow + 1).String & "?",4) if rtncd <> 6 then exit sub end if
for i = 0 to 6 DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnGameCol+i, _DestnRow + startrow).String = DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnGameCol+i, _DestnRow + startrow + 1).String next i for i = 0 to 6 DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnGameCol+i, _DestnRow + startrow + 1).String = tmpdestn(i) next i
LogThis "Swapped top 2 cards of the destination deck." end sub
function Legendary as integer dim destID, startrow, rtncd, destndist as integer dim destnstr, destndesc as string GetDestn
'Walk destinations to see if we've added Legendary Discovery Legendary = 0 for destID = 1 to GetDestnCnt() if DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnJumpCol, _DestnRow + destID).String = "" then exit for end if if InStr(DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnGameCol, _DestnRow + destID).String, "X") > 0 then Legendary = Legendary + 1 end if next destID end function
'+== STILL NEED TO UPDATE THIS sub EnableSpecialDistance(crisisname as string) GetDestn
DestnForm.getByName("btnLegendary").enabled = true DestnForm.getByName("btnLegendary").label = crisisname end sub
sub AddLegendaryDiscovery dim destID, specID, startrow, rtncd, destndist, prevdist, i as integer dim destnstr, destndesc, legarr(6) as string GetDestn
destnstr = DestnForm.getByName("btnLegendary").label rtncd = MsgBox("Add Distance from " & destnstr & "?",4) if rtncd <> 6 then exit sub end if
' Find the Crisis near the bottom of the Destination pile specID = 0 for destID = 1 to _MaxSpecialCnt if DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnDeckCol, _DestnRow + GetDestnCnt + destID).String = destnstr then for i = 0 to 6 legarr(i) = DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnGameCol + i, _DestnRow + GetDestnCnt + destID).String next i destndist = DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnDistanceCol, _DestnRow + GetDestnCnt + destID).string specID = destID exit for end if next destID
if specID = 0 then MsgBox "Couldn't find " & destnstr & "." exit sub end if
'we're going legendary...shuffle destinations down and add the legendary discovery 'get the first available destination for destID = 1 to GetDestnCnt() if DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnDeckCol,_DestnRow + destID).String <> "" then startrow = destID exit for end if next destID
' Count backwards from the Special we just picked up. for destID = GetDestnCnt() + specID to startrow step -1 for i = 0 to 6 DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnGameCol + i, _DestnRow + destID).String = DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnGameCol + i, _DestnRow + destID-1).String next i next destID
' Put the Special on the bottom of the resolved pile for i = 0 to 6 DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnGameCol+i, _DestnRow + startrow).string = legarr(i) next i
' Mark it as resolved. DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnJumpCol, _DestnRow + startrow).string = DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnDeckCol, _DestnRow + startrow).string DestnSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DestnDeckCol, _DestnRow + startrow).string = ""
prevdist = GetTotalDistance() SetTotalDistance prevdist + destndist
LogThis destnstr & "! Total distance now " & GetTotalDistance
HandleDistanceTriggers(TRUE) ' Ships stay in space as this wasn't a Jump. DestnForm.getByName("btnLegendary").enabled = FALSE end sub 'AddLegendaryDiscovery
sub EnableDestButtons (enflag as boolean) DestnForm.GetByName("btnJumpToDest").enabled = enflag DestnForm.GetByName("btnBuryDest").enabled = enflag DestnForm.getByName("btnLegendary").enabled = enflag end sub
sub GetSleeperState as boolean GetSleeperState = (GetTotalDistance() >= _SleeperDistance) end sub
